net.datacrow.core.clients

Interface IModuleWizardClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IClient

    public interface IModuleWizardClient
extends IClient
    A client for Item Export processes
    Author:
    Robert Jan van der Waals

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface net.datacrow.core.clients.IClient

        _ERROR, _INFO, _WARNING

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifyNewTask()
      A module import consists of many small tasks.
      void notifyStartedSubProcess(int count)
      Indicates a sub process has been started.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.datacrow.core.clients.IClient

        isCancelled, notify, notifyError, notifyProcessed, notifyTaskCompleted, notifyTaskStarted, notifyWarning

    • Method Detail

      • notifyNewTask

        void notifyNewTask()
        A module import consists of many small tasks. Notifies this client that a new task has been started.

      • notifyStartedSubProcess

        void notifyStartedSubProcess(int count)
        Indicates a sub process has been started. This allows the client to either update its secondary progress bar or temporarily use the main progress bar to indicate the status of the sub process.
        Parameters:
        count - size of the task

      • notifySubProcessed

        void notifySubProcessed()
        Notifies that a single step in the sub process has been completed. Solely used for progress tracking.
